title: @ThermalKitten Did you write "Progress Day" ?
body:
If so, it is awesome ! And if not, you're still awesome for these glorious Camille stories ! 
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: Progress Day was written by the mighty Graham "Dinopawz" McNeill! And yes, agreed, TK is still awesome.

> [{quoted}](name=Jaredan,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=iO34TE7T,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-02T06:38:20.937+0000)
>
> Progress Day was written by the mighty Graham "Dinopawz" McNeill! And yes, agreed, TK is still awesome.

*SPOILER*

What an unexpected ending lol. But I got it when she said "I was born in Piltover" while how she was talking about his home country for entire story.

She also said I would be dead if I was in my home country, which I expected Shurima, Bilgewater or Noxus. I did not assume an agent though. I feel stupid.
I thought they were going to put her in some new or unnamed country.

> [{quoted}](name=Jaredan,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=iO34TE7T,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-02T06:38:20.937+0000)
>
> Progress Day was written by the mighty Graham "Dinopawz" McNeill! And yes, agreed, TK is still awesome.

Thanks ! Well, considering the kinda grim approach to Piltover and the Commissar Caitlyn i should've guess it was him D:

Are there ant plans to credit the authors directly ? I can feel why it's not the case, but i think the response would be majorly positive and could spark some interesting discussion.

And by the way, Jaredan, is there an ETA for the rest of the story ?

Can we expect it on a weekly basis ? Or every 2-3 days ?
